      • onSave

        public void onSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField apptField,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField titleField,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField descrField,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField locField,
                   javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> contactBox,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField typeField,
                   javafx.scene.control.DatePicker startDateField,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField startHrField,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField startMinField,
                   javafx.scene.control.DatePicker endDateField,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField endHrField,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField endMinField,
                   javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> customerBox,
                   javafx.scene.control.TextField userField,
                   javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                   javafx.scene.Scene scene)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves the appointment.
        Parameters:
        event - the ActionEvent from the save button.
        apptField - the TextField containing the appointment id.
        titleField - the TextField containing the title.
        descrField - the TextField containing the description.
        locField - the TextField containing the location.
        contactBox - the ComboBox containing the contact.
        typeField - the TextField containing the appointment.
        startDateField - the DatePicker containing the start date of the appointment.
        startHrField - the TextField containing the starting hour of the appointment.
        startMinField - the TextField containing the starting minutes of the appointment.
        endDateField - the DatePicker containing the ending date of the appointment.
        endHrField - the TextField containing the ending hour of the appointment.
        endMinField - the TextField containing the ending minute of the appointment.
        customerBox - the ComboBox containing the appointment's customer.
        userField - the TextField containing the user id.
        stage - the Stage the form takes place on.
        scene - the Scene the form takes place on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception needed to make this button run.

      • onCancel

        public void onCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event,
                     javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                     javafx.scene.Scene scene)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Cancel saving and close out the appointment form. Reload the dashboard.
        Parameters:
        event - the ActionEvent associated with the cancel button.
        stage - the Stage the appointment form takes place on.
        scene - the Scene the appointment form takes place on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception needed to run the cancel button.
